document_data.name: ''Candle of the Deep''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''candle of the deep''''' was a [[magic item|magical]] [[candle]] that continued to burn even if immersed in [[water]].
document_data.Description: ''Candles of the deep'' burned at the same rate and gave off the same luminosity as ordinary candles.
document_data.Powers: Even if completely submerged, a ''candle of the deep'' did not stop burning.
document_data.Notable Owners: The [[marid]] [[Ichthyglug]] offered a ''candle of the deep'' as part of a reward to adventurers who brought him the [[phylactery]] of the [[lich]] [[Ezzat]].
